page.title: 16POPULATION KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content:
Population distribution centres on the 2 villages with scattered, outlying farms and dwellings.Population density is low at 0.44 per hectare for Kirkby Malzeard & 0.28 for Grewelthorpe. Census statistics show a population increase of 9% in both parishes due in part to renovation of old properties & some new building. Other statistics for the Parish are given below:
G K.M.
Parish population 384 615 Number of Males 188 293 Number of Females 196 322 % of Pensionable age 18 26 % Under 16 23 21 Number of dwellings 142 232
G = GREWELTHORPE;K.M.= KIRKBY MALZEARD
